movie_title: India asks IMF to review loans to Pakistan, says government source
introduction: A report by Reuters has cited an Indian government source suggesting New Delhi has asked the Interna

vocabulary.definition: in the middle of or surrounded by; during
vocabulary.example: The negotiations took place amid escalating tensions between the two countries.

vocabulary.definition: to publicly support or recommend a particular cause or policy
vocabulary.example: The organization advocates for better access to education for all children.

vocabulary.definition: dependent on someone or something for support, help, or supply
vocabulary.example: The company is heavily reliant on technology for its day-to-day operations.

vocabulary.definition: done by or affecting only one person, group, or country involved in a situation, without the agreement of others
vocabulary.example: The decision to increase tariffs was made unilaterally by the government.

vocabulary.definition: relating to deep inward feelings rather than to the intellect
vocabulary.example: Her visceral reaction to the news was one of shock and disbelief.

vocabulary.definition: a basic structure underlying a system, concept, or text
vocabulary.example: The legal framework for the new policy is still being developed.
